title: 60,000 homes signed up for innovative tech scheme to help drive down burglary (Greater London ...
text: ( Source : Greater London Authority ) 60, 000 homes in the capital have already signed up to a pioneering new anti-burglary kit launched by the Mayor in March this year to help reduce burglary rates in London , which have already come down by up
